id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

avatar.description: The user's selected avatar (e.g., an emoji).

Emotion.title: Emotion
Emotion.description: Represents an emotion that a user can track.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Emotion entity.

color.description: The color associated with the emotion (e.g., a hex code).

description.description: A description of what the emotion means to the user.

DiaryEntry.title: DiaryEntry
DiaryEntry.description: Represents a diary entry recording a user's emotion and experience on a specific date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the DiaryEntry entity.

date.description: The date of the diary entry.

text.description: A textual description of the user's experience.

/userProfiles/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. Accessible only by the user with matching UID.

/users/{userId}/emotions/{emotionId}.description: Stores user-defined emotions. Accessible only by the user with matching UID.

/users/{userId}/diaryEntries/{diaryEntry.description: Stores diary entries for a specific user. Includes denormalized 'userId' for authorization independence.
